subject:
svn commit: samba r22403 - in branches/SAMBA_4_0/source:
	cldap_server kdc ldap_server nbt_server ntptr smbd web_server

body:
Author: metze
Date: 2007-04-20 10:57:13 +0000 (Fri, 20 Apr 2007)
New Revision: 22403

Log:
this dependencies should be private

metze
